sub_title: Quality Assurance Lead at EPAM Systems
summary:
10 years of experience in IT (QA outsource, QA in full cycle development). 
eCommerce (ATG, Commercetools platforms; Zooz, Adyen, Braintree integrations) and Telecom domains

Experience in:
- Manual and Automation QA teams leading
- Test strategy and test plan
- Tools definition
- Discovery, estimations, staffing
- Project Delivery and Release activities
- Hosting Scrum ceremonies and team trainings
Roles:
- Functional Tester/Team Leader
- Scrum Master
- Project Coordinator 

Hands-on experience in:
- web and mobile web-applications 
- Functional/UI testing, Compatibility and Regression testing; Integration and Localization testing
- E2E testing, UAT, rolling out and live testing organizing/support
- analysis for non-functional testing and further collaboration with Performance and Security teams

Being on position of QA lead covered full cycle of project and feature delivery, UAT/LIVE testing approach definition and support (physical support on customer side), communication with 3-party systems, dependencies monitoring (both for BE and FE projects). 
Close collaboration with automation team, setting up priorities and strategy for automation. 
Project Coordinator role extended areas of responsibilities with Staffing activities and leading developers team. Gained experience on Scrum master role.

In addition, involved in mentoring, experience of interviewing and conference speech.

Certificates:
ISTQB Certified Tester, Foundation Level
Professional Scrum Master™ I (PSM I)
Certified SAFe® 5 Agilist

certifications.name: Certified Tester, Foundation Level
certifications.authority: ASTQB - ISTQB in the U.S. - Official Page

profile_positions.description:
Project: Business Information and Media 
Household Multimedia Hub, based on ‘Set Top Box’ device class. This Multi Media Hub provides access to a wide range of media content, including Live Broadcasting channels, Video On Demand, Replay content, Recordings, Radio channels, third-party Applications. Content can be provided through this Hub in various ways:
• QAM streaming
• IP streaming
• many devices in household with full interaction and resources sharing
• full interoperability between Set Top Box and dedicated mobile application
• recordings realized on Cloud infrastructure
• recordings realized on local HDD
• interoperability with SmartTV and Audio equipment

Build verification team for release and master builds that covers with testing development work done of few Feature team:
- Verification for master builds before sending them for country teams
- daily reporting for build status and acceptance (based on automation scripts run analysis) + exploratory testing
- Change log verification
- AdHoc/Exloratory testing for release builds
- Communication with other teams for changes within builds

Team	
- 15 QAs

Tools	
WinSCP
Custom log collector tool
cmd
Swagger
Jenkins
Jira/Confluence

profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project: eCommerce for fashion retailer; payments and checkout team

Role of QA lead
- Functional/UI testing; Web/web-mobile testing
- Integration/end-to-end testing
- API testing
- Server side testing
- Test documents creation/update
- Run automation scripts/analyzing results
- Migration testing from one Payment integrator (Zooz) to another (Adyen)
- Integration with new payment gateways

Responsibilities:
- Prioritization for QA Automation team
- Test strategy
- Participation in discovery phase, estimations
- LIVE testing support  - scenarios creation, technical support and trouble-shouting 

Additional Activities:
- communication with customer (planning, retro, bug triage, workshops, etc)
- communication with 3party systems
- support of global Burberry ATG releases

Team	
Project: more than 180 team members
Stream: 5 back-end developers, 2 UI developers, 5 manual QAs + 2 Automation QAs

Jenkins

WinSCP/Putty

profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Lead

profile_positions.description:
Communication skills, ability of getting on well with the newbies, easy way of introducing theory together with experience of successful training of new people on the project helped me to be a mentor for the newcomers in the company. Firstly, I started as a general mentor for the newcomers who are trained not for the certain project, but for the future ones in general.  Then, as an additional activity, I became a technical mentor – an owner of the test tasks for the newbies oriented on the certain skills.

My professional set of skills at this level includes the following tasks and activities:
✔ Theory training
✔ Practical testing tasks training
✔ Adaptation of the newcomers
✔ Progress tracking
profile_positions.title: Mentor

profile_positions.description: Proactive attitude, communication skills, ability of getting on well with new people and necessary knowledge base provide me additional position as an interviewer of the candidates without working experience.
profile_positions.title: Interviewer

profile_positions.description:
Successful leading experience of the project I started with, responsibility for the results, good skills in the planning of the testing strategy and activities give me the opportunity to try myself as QA Project Lead. Working both on full-cycle projects starting from the planning stage of development and project improvements for the systems which are already in Production use. All these projects give me an opportunity of the testing strategy making under the conduction of fixed efforts, time and material work, dedicated team.
At this stage, I distribute tasks among the QA team (currently leading team of 9 QAs on 6 projects), plan and estimate activities, prepare financial reports for the customer.

My professional set of skills at this level includes the following tasks and activities:
✔ Controlling budget and deadlines, collecting QA metrics and Quantitative Management
✔ Communicating with the Development and Customer’s teams (off-site and on-site)
✔ Functional testing of non-trivial cases, handling support tickets and processing Customer requests
✔ Team Knowledge Base creation and maintaining
✔ Process improvements and hardening
profile_positions.title: QA Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
My ability to learn quickly, to learn complex tasks under the lack of input requirements, good team work skills and communication helped me execute the responsibilities of QA Lead on the current project. 

My professional set of skills at this level includes the following tasks and activities:
✔ Planning, estimating, and distributing regular tasks among Team members
✔ Creating status reports for the Customer side
✔ Communication with the Development and Customer’s teams
✔ Functional testing, incl. full acceptance testing, defect validation, regression testing, etc.
✔ Creating test documentation and bug reports
✔ Functional testing of non-trivial cases, support tickets and Customer requests
✔ Maintenance of project space and test environments
profile_positions.title: QA Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Starting the career being the 4th course student and showing of good results and easy learning I closed the probationary period in the company within the first month (having standard 3 months period). Was introduced to the customer and started working in the Production.

My professional set of skills mainly consisted of the following tasks and activities:
✔ Black box testing of Web-based applications
✔ Smoke (sanity) tests of regular application builds
✔ Positive (minimal acceptance) and negative (acceptance) tests
✔ Defects validation and regression testing
✔ New feature testing
✔ Creation, update and maintenance of different test documentation types: acceptance sheet, test survey, test cases.
✔ Cross browser and cross platform testing, incl. all modern / popular / widely spread browsers and operating systems.
✔ Communication with the Development and Customer’s team.
✔ Test model creation, refinement and its quality control.
✔ Quality reports creation.
profile_positions.title: QA Engineer
